text: RT @annjsmall: @StinkStopthe @scottdegg @NewsNBC @EnvAgency Currently heaving, feel so sick with the stench in my property from that disgus‚Ä¶

Poor old @EnvAgency the wheels really are coming off the bus.

2019/20 target for "Kms of rivers enhanced", 2,300. 

Achieved? 1,753. Oops.

Target for 20/21 3,900.

Achieved in Q1? 31. Yes, that's right 31. Double oops.

PS. Can anyone tell me what "Enhanced", actually means? https://t.co/oa1m2WCN5V
RT @EnvAgencyMids: In response to increased community concerns of odour in Silverdale #NewcastleUnderLyme & surrounding area we will be ins‚Ä¶

RT @EnvAgencySE: Did you listen to @JennyNewhamEA on @BBCRadioKent today? Our need for volunteer flood wardens.

Interested? 

To find out‚Ä¶

@BroxbourneBC sort this mess out will you, it‚Äôs absolutely disgusting that this is outside a pre-school, would you like to drop your kids off and see this? This needs shutting down!!! üò°üò° @EnvAgency #V&E #BBFC #GOFFS #GOFFSLANE https://t.co/O72wkI0Hu2

urls.title: EA struggles with high-risk illegal waste site target | MRW
urls.description: Data for its scorecard for the first quarter of 2020-21 showed it fell short of its target to close down 250 such sites. It reported tackling 233 sites.

text: @scottdegg @Sotlive @EnvAgency @JamesBevanEA @AaronBell4NUL @StaffsFire @StinkStopthe @NewsNBC Had no sleep as yet again my house stinks like the dumps in Calcutta, yet I've got to do a days work feeling so rough this morning, this can't go on, mane we should all go docs for sick note every time we're kept awake with headaches etc from the stink, this is horrendous.

RT @WindrushWasp: Tankering sewage around is cheaper than sorting out the causes and the failed sewage system @thameswater  The @EnvAgency‚Ä¶

to a massive tyre dump run by unscrupulous operators who boast of being ‚Äòuntouchable‚Äô literally 2 cars‚Äô width from our front doors. Only the old high boundary wall separates us. So forgive me @bradfordmdc @EnvAgency if we‚Äôre a ‚Äòbit naggy‚Äô and ‚Äòwon‚Äôt shut up‚Äô.

@srhodes81 @cumbriawildlife @unitedutilities @EnvAgencyNW These projects aim to show that NFM can work within existing farm business models. Demonstration sites like Birds Park are invaluable for landowners to see each technique in real life. Rolling NFM out in a whole catchment will be a slow process but like you, we are hopeful too!

@DrEdHenderson @EnvAgencyMids @DaveThroupEA Yep that map is from end of Jan so although it‚Äôs an illustration of how wet everything is generally the specifics will have shifted - esp given Feb‚Äôs rainfall stats. Cumbria has had much more if late than it did in Jan I suspect.
RT @JoolzDenby: Wonder how @EnvAgency  @bradfordmdc etc would like living with a packed bag since 2015 and being frightened stiff every tim‚Ä¶
RT @JoolzDenby: Wonder how @EnvAgency  @bradfordmdc etc would like living with a packed bag since 2015 and being frightened stiff every tim‚Ä¶

Wonder how @EnvAgency  @bradfordmdc etc would like living with a packed bag since 2015 and being frightened stiff every time they smell a bonfire because a man put a massive out of control tyre dump next to their house & now wants to make that even worse?

@ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids @DaveThroupEA As a resident of Cumbria, the low sensitivity of the fells caught my eye. They don‚Äôt have much soil moisture deficit especially after 170 mm over two days. https://t.co/LVUXXxlOQK

More Rubbish at the foot of the Walton-Le-Dale Fish Ladder on the River Darwen. It's not acceptable and adds to the UK  contaminated river systems @EnvAgencyNW @leponline @blogpreston #Preston #waltonledale #pollution #River https://t.co/Ps3leV5IwI

entity.name: Countryfile
entity.description: Stories are shared of the people, places and issues at the heart of the British countryside. Popular features include the programme's photography contest, which culminates in a yearly calendar sold to benefit charity, the Video Diary, produced by viewers and focused on life in rural areas, and the weather forecasts.

domain.name: TV Shows
domain.description: Television shows from around the world

entity.name: Countryfile Diaries
entity.description: A sister show to the BBC's `Countryfile' series, this rural affairs programme sees a team of presenters travel the length and breadth of the United Kingdom to cover stories related to the British countryside and the season of spring. As this period is a busy time of the year for the farming and outdoor communities in particular, regular topics covered include the production of food, nature conservation, and a look at a chosen area's culture and history. Stunning landscapes and a variety of wildlife also feature prominently.

text: @SE_Rivers_Trust NOT protecting the #Hogsmill River from over-development. Why not? Vested interests driving na "environmental" chaity? Surely not... @naturalengland @EnvAgency @EnvAgencySE @thameswater @alison_fure

@srhodes81 @cumbriawildlife @unitedutilities @EnvAgencyNW Hi Steven. Sorry you feel that way.
